note.p: Daughter of James Farrer and his wife, Frances Loxham. Aunt of Thomas Henry Farrer. In Plumstead, Kent, with Eliza Frazer, aged 40, Mary Rich, aged 50, and Frances Wedgwood, aged 8 (probably Frances Julia Wedgwood), in 1841.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/484/19/11/16)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 July 2022)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/2044/323)
